div.head: 寒熱怪病
div.div: queer disease of alternating sensations of cold and heat

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: queer disease of alternating sensations of cold and heat

sense.def: Pathological Condition of an unusual disease with alternating sensations of cold and heat continuing for several days, eventually resulting in a stone-like hardening of the four extremities, and emaciation progressing daily. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry hua shi quotes Zhi qi ji fang 治奇疾方 : 寒熱 不止，數日四肢堅如石，擊之似鐘磬聲，日漸瘦惡 , “Alternating sensations of cold and heat that do not end. After several days the four limbs turn as hard as stone. If one strikes them, there is a sound like that produced by the chimestone of a bell. Emaciation increases day by day”. LSZ calls this: 寒熱怪病 , “ Queer disease of alternating sensations of cold and heat ”.
